summary: This mod adds fierce Nordic Beauty Brynhildr to the Temple of the Divines in Solitude.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Brynhildr 

[/size][/color][/font][size=4][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff]This mod introduces Brynhildr, a Nordic warrior to the Temple of the Divines in Solitude. She uses "Female Even Toned" (Evette San, Carlotta Valentia) voice, and comes fully equipped with Nordic armor and weapons. She is marriageable, and scales with the player (0.75 ratio) and can be made either a steward or housecarl for Hearthfires. 

[/color][/font][/size][i][size=4]*Ran through Tes5Edit and playtested (checked for errors, sorted masters)![/size][/i][size=4][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff]


[/color][/font][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff]Please refer to the 'instructions' readme and the required mods section to find out what you will need for this mod to work. 

[b][u]*NOTE[/u][/b]: [i]I am using facelight in the save these pics were taken from, so if Malacoda looks like he 'may' have gray face in the pics it's just the lighting difference from the Facelight spell. [/i][/color][/font][/size]
[font=Tahoma][color=#ffff00][size=3]
[/size][/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Features:[/size][/color][/font]

[list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Marriageable [/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Housecarl or Steward for Hearthfire [/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Lightfoot (will not set off traps)[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Essential (cannot be killed)[/size][/color][/font]
[/list][font=Times New Roman][size=4]
Mods I am using for this Mod (not required, but recommended):
[list]
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457]Facelight[/url]﻿ by tktk1
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70]Nude Females[/url]﻿ by Thepal
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2812/]Better Females[/url]﻿ by Bella
[/list][/size][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Credits [/size][/color][/font]

[font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Big thanks goes to [/size][/color][/font]

[list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/]Kalilies [/url]﻿& Stealthic for KS Hairdo's Renewal[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/]LogRaam[/url]﻿ for The Eyes of Beauty [/size][/color][/font]
[/list]
author: AedanStarfang
